荲荲荲

荲字的基本解释

荲
lí
羊蹄菜，一种草本植物。

荲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lí］
［《廣韻》許竹切，入屋，曉。］
多年生草本植物，也叫羊蹄菜。根可入药，称土大黄。

荲字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　荲； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1031第43
【唐韻】恥六切【集韻】敕六切，?音矗。【博雅】荲羊蹄也。【本草】一名東方宿，一名連蟲陸。　又【揚子·方言·郭璞註】䖆葇、荲，菜也。亦蘇之種類。　又【說文】陵之切，讀若釐。草也。【齊民要術】《字林》云：荲草似冬藍，蒸食之。

考證：〔【博雅】羊蹄萊也。〕　謹照原文改荲羊蹄也。
荲字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
荲字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Ning
lí
Berry, a kind of herb.
Ning
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [lí]
["Guangyun" Xu Zhuqie, enter the house, Xiao. ]
Perennial herb, also called sheep's hoof. The root can be used as medicine and is called rhubarb.

[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　荲; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1031 Page 43
【Tang Yun】Six cuts of shame 【Ji Yun】Six cuts of shame, the sound is chu. [Bo Ya] The sheep's hoof is also. [Materia Medica] One is Dongfangsu, and the other is Lian Chonglu.　[Yangtze·Dialect·Guo Pu's Note】Zheyan, Nun, Caiye. The type of Yisu.　[Said the text] The cut of the mausoleum, reading Ruo Li. Grass also. [Qi Min Yaoshu] "The Forest of Characters" says: Mushroom resembles winter blue, steamed and eaten. Textual research: [[Bo Ya] Sheep's hoof Lai also. 〕　I would like to change the sheep's hoof according to the original text.
